## Description
The Ice Storage Bin is a small brick bin for handling and&#10;storing extracted ice and water for future use.

|--------:|:------|
|Category:|Storage|
|Construction:|PRE_FABRICATED|
|Size:|2.0 x 3.0 m|
|Level:|0|
|Maintenance Period:|50|
|Power Demands:|0.0 kW|
